title: (x) Pike Place Public Market Center sign - various similar {gang}
content:
hey everybody, wondering if you had any ideas of what typeface or similar is used in the Pike Place Market sign in Seattle, I know it's something Art Deco, and I have Mostra by Mark Simonson, but it's something else, any leads would be appreciated!

[here's the image](http://web.archive.org/web/20130908123556/http:/www.roddyscheer.com/images/public_market_center.jpg)
author: waves

comments.content:
I'm betting it's custom lettering, but here are some other suggestions:

Neutraface Display - House Industries - [http://www.houseind.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130908123556/http:/www.houseind.com/ "http://www.houseind.com")  
Richmond - Jim Parkinson - [http://www.typedesign.com/fonts/riclt.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130908123556/http:/www.typedesign.com/fonts/riclt.html "http://www.typedesign.com/fonts/riclt.html")  
Metro (Geometric 415) - several vendors

The market opened in 1907 - not sure if the sign was first set up at that time. Some pics...

[http://www.jardeen.com/art/desktops/pikeplacemarket.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130908123556/http:/www.jardeen.com/art/desktops/pikeplacemarket.jpg "http://www.jardeen.com/art/desktops/pikeplacemarket.jpg")

[http://www.acoustics.washington.edu/~gauthier/Photography/Seattle/01\_Cit...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130908123556/http:/www.acoustics.washington.edu/~gauthier/Photography/Seattle/01_City/pp0033.jpg "http://www.acoustics.washington.edu/~gauthier/Photography/Seattle/01\_City/pp0033.jpg")

[http://www.jcresidential.com/images/market.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130908123556/http:/www.jcresidential.com/images/market.jpg "http://www.jcresidential.com/images/market.jpg")

As you can see there are several styles.

Si

If it's the red neon you want I think Neutraface Condensed will get you closest. Also: [Blakely](http://web.archive.org/web/20130908123556/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=MSF.118742.0.0&fontRendererText=PUBLIC+MARKET+CENTER)
